articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Flight Training of Unit of KPA Air and Anti-Air Force
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Flight Training of Unit of KPA Air and Anti-Air Force 
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, guided a flight training of KPA Air and Anti-Air Force Unit 188 honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led Seventh Regiment on Monday.
					 He gave an order to start the training.
					
					 Kil Hun, son of Hero Kil Yong Jo, took off before others.
					
					 Kim Jong Un watched his flight, his face beaming with a broad smile. He was very pleased to watch it, saying: "He is the son of Hero Kil Yong Jo. He is flying in the sky just as his father did. That is the flight made to defend the country, following in the footsteps of his father. Excellent."
					
					 Kil Hun skillfully piloted the plane to the place where Kim Jong Un was waiting for him before making a report on his fulfillment of the training order to him.
					
					 Hugging him and holding his hands for a while, Kim Jong Un said with appreciation: "You are admirable. Well done. I listened with keen attention to your speech made at the meeting of airpersons. You have shown in practice the pledge you made there."
					
					 He kindly asked Kil how old he was when his father died and if he remembered his father. Kim Jong Un added: "He lost his father when he was three years old. He has grown up to stand at the post guarded by his father. He has become a squadron leader at the age of 25 like his father. The generation of our revolution is replaced by a new one like this."
					
					 Recalling that Hero Kil Yong Jo was a genuine combat pilot who showed in practice the spirit of devotedly defending the leader, Kim Jong Un urged Kil Hun to take the lead in flying to defend the country as his father did. He had a photo taken with him, holding him in his arms.
					
					 Then, planes of the unit took off, making twin formations.
					
					 The flying corps performed difficult flight missions, making a barrel roll at a very low altitude and fully demonstrated the militant stamina of the fighters to mercilessly blow up the citadel of enemies and wipe out the enemies to the last one by making prompt sorties like the lightning over Mt. Paektu once an order is issued any moment.
					
					 He met the airpersons who finished their training and encouraged them. Then he had a photo taken with them.
					
					 He said he organized the training without any prior notice upon being told that the airmen came back from the meeting yesterday, but it was very successful, adding this proved that the unit has always kept itself fully combat ready in response to the slogan "We wait for the Party's sortie order."
					
					 "As an air battle allows no moment's delay," he said, instructing the unit to intensify the flight training so as to fully prepare the airpersons as death-defying corps in the sky and able combat pilots capable of skillfully fighting a modern warfare.
					
					 He was accompanied by Jang Jong Nam, So Hong Chan, Han Kwang Sang, Hwang Pyong So, Ri Jae Il, Kim Pyong Ho and Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits January 8 Fishery Station of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits January 8 Fishery Station of KPA
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, visited the January 8 Fishery Station of the KPA near its commissioning.
					 He looked round different places of the station to learn in detail about its construction and preparations for its operation.
					
					 While walking on the breakwater extending hundreds of meters in waters, he said that he felt as if he were on an airstrip.
					
					 He praised the station for successfully building facilities needed for freezing and salting aquatic products and for having in place a conveyor for selecting and washing fishes, flat-style freezer, refrigerator cars, tank cars, forklifts, etc provided by the Party.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that a dormitory and resting room were built on the highest level so that fishermen might make themselves at home.
					
					 Noting that a district of multi-story houses for fishermen was built as well as Unha Scientists Street, he kindly named the district "Tanphung Village for Fishermen."
					
					 He got aboard a newly-built fishing boat to learn about its technical specifications, saying with pleasure that many modern fishing boats of "Tanphung"-class are now being built as intended by the Party and their performances are daily increasing.
					
					 "This fishery station is an eye-opening marvelous edifice in the era of the Workers' Party and a new scenery representing the era of Songun at a fishing port on the east coast of the country," he noted.
					
					 He said with confidence that the station would be called the 14th scenic spot of Songun in the future when all the holds of the station will be packed with fishes.
					
					 He noted it is an astonishing miracle and a Korean speed that such huge project was successfully completed in a matter of a little over two months since an initiative was made to construct the fishery station and it is expected to go operational soon. 
					
					 He highly appreciated the feats performed by soldier-builders, saying that the Party was able to keep the promise made with the people thanks to the indomitable work style of the soldier-builders who rose up as one to fulfill the Partyâ€™s order. 
					
					 He called on the fisheries field of the army and society to take the January 8 Fishery Station as a standard when building a new fishery station or remodeling the existing one as the Party made sure that it was built as a model for all fishery stations across the country.
					
					 "It is the Party's firm determination to make the whole country pervade with the spirit of making big fish haul under socialism", he noted, calling on the officials and fishermen of the station to live up to the Party's expectation with increased production. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Jang Jong Nam, So Hong Chan, Han Kwang Sang, Hwang Pyong So, Ri Jae Il, Kim Pyong Ho and Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Greetings to Algerian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Algerian President 
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a congratulatory message to Abdelaziz Bouteflika on his reelection as president of Algeria. 
					 The message wished the Algerian president and people fresh and bigger successes in their work for strengthening national unity and achieving economic prosperity. 
					
					 It expressed belief that the historical relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams Artifice by Political Swindlers
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams Artifice by Political Swindlers
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Michael Kirby, chairman of the "Commission of Inquiry (CI)" on human rights situation in the DPRK, called a press conference at the UN headquarters on April 17.
					 He told reporters of different countries, skeptical about the truth of CI's "human rights report", that it was based on "testimonies" by "defectors". With such awkward excuse, he asserted it is high time that a UNSC was called to discuss the DPRK's "human rights issue" and bring it to the International Criminal Court.
					
					 His rash act is a last-ditch effort intended to lend credence to the "report" peppered with fabrications and create an atmosphere of international pressure on the DPRK in this regard.
					
					 Lurking behind it is a dishonest and political purpose of the U.S. and its followers seeking to undermine the ideology and social system of the DPRK.
					
					 Now, the forces hostile toward the DPRK regard the "human rights issue" as a main lever for stifling it since they had no way out over the "nuclear issue".
					
					 After all, such political swindlers as Kirby were mobilized so as to internationalize the nonexistent "human rights issue" of the DPRK.
					
					 As for Kirby who took the lead in cooking the "report", he is a disgusting old lecher with a 40-odd-year-long career of homosexuality. He is now over seventy, but he is still anxious to get married to his homosexual partner.
					
					 This practice can never be found in the DPRK boasting of the sound mentality and good morals, and homosexuality has become a target of public criticism even in Western countries, too. In fact, it is ridiculous for such gay to sponsor dealing with others' human rights issue.
					
					 As been already known, what was put up by Kirby and his group as data is all testimonies made by those "defectors", who are runaways or terrorists as they betrayed their country and nation after committing indelible crimes.
					
					 However, the Kirby group styling itself a judge accepted such unconfirmed data to cook up the "report". This makes one question if the group has an elementary legal sense. After all, they changed their position as judges with money paid by the U.S. and its followers.
					
					 At present, many countries and even Western media and personages are astonished at the Kirby group's "report" presented to a sacred UN body, terming it a replica of Nazi-style arbitrariness.
					
					 It is so pitiable for the U.S. and its followers to attempt to frighten the DPRK by letting such dirty swindlers, ready to do anything for money, invent an anti-DPRK false document.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK reject the fabricated document as a foul crime unprecedented in the world history of human rights and will surely force them to pay dearly for it.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses U.S. and S. Korean Authorities for Increasing Danger of War
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses U.S. and S. Korean Authorities for Increasing Danger of War
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The Foal Eagle, the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises, clearly proved that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities do not want to improve the relations with the DPRK even a bit.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday says this in a commentary. It goes on:
					
					 From the outset of the year the DPRK has made sincere efforts with the noble patriotic will to open up a turning phase for independent reunification, peace and prosperity by improving the deteriorated north-south relations at any costs.
					
					 The practical measures and sincere efforts of the DPRK provided an opportunity for improving the north-south relations.
					
					 Pressurized by the U.S., the puppet warmongers staged the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises in collusion with the U.S., chilling the atmosphere for the improvement of the north-south relations and pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to an extreme pitch of strain. 
					
					 This fully revealed the belligerent nature of the U.S., the very one wrecking peace, escalating tensions and increasing the danger of a war on the Korean peninsula, and the puppet forces kowtowing to it.
					
					 The Foal Eagle clearly proved once again that it is the most correct option for the nation that the DPRK has bolstered its self-defensive war deterrent under the unfurled banner of Songun.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams U.S.-S. Korea Confab for Nuclear War against DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams U.S.-S. Korea Confab for Nuclear War against DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Recently the U.S. and the south Korean puppet war maniacs held the  KIDD meeting in Washington, where they discussed the detailed ways for carrying out their "tailored deterrent strategy" and agreed to "continue intensifying their joint drills". It is said that at the meeting the former reconfirmed its "commitment" to provide the latter with all its military capabilities including nuclear umbrella.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary terms the meeting a criminal confab between the master and its servant to ratchet up its moves to provoke a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 It is as clear as a pikestaff that the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers reviewed at the confab the performance of the "tailored deterrent strategy" applied in their Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills and discussed a scenario of provoking a war against the DPRK through a preemptive nuclear attack on it.
					
					 What can not be overlooked is that the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are accusing the DPRK, talking about its "missile launching" and "additional nuclear test threat" in a bid to conceal their sinister design to provoke a nuclear war against it.
					
					 In actuality, the very ones compelling the DPRK to bolster up its war deterrence for self-defence including the missile launching drills are no other than the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers blindly kowtowing to the U.S.
					
					 The missile launching drills conducted by the DPRK and its notice to conduct a nuclear test of a new form are all self-defensive countermeasures to cope with the risky war moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 The U.S. has brought its forces across the ocean to the Korean peninsula to stage war drills targeting the DPRK under its eyes. Nevertheless, the former is accusing the latter of its regular missile launching drills staged in its territory and its measures for strengthening its nuclear deterrence. 
					
					 This only brings to light the U.S. brigandish nature.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Turning Pyongyang into Center of Songun Culture
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Turning Pyongyang into Center of Songun Culture
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an editorial calls upon all people to turn out as one to spruce up Pyongyang as the capital of the revolution and center of Songun culture, true to the plan and intention of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Thanks to the energetic leadership of the WPK, many world-class monumental edifices including Changjon Street, Rungna People's Pleasure Park, Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, Munsu Water Park and Mirim Riding Club were built in different parts of Pyongyang, radically changing the appearance of the capital.
					
					 It is the intention of the WPK to spruce up Pyongyang as the center of Songun culture and turn the whole country into a socialist fairyland with it as a model.
					
					 It is not a simple business-like matter to successfully spruce up Pyongyang as a center of Songun culture
					
					 It is an important political work for demonstrating the dignity and prestige of Songun Korea to spruce up Pyongyang to be impeccable in any aspect in the world.
					
					 The WPK's goal for building a highly civilized socialist nation is very high and grandiose and Pyongyang is taking the lead in the efforts to achieve it.
					
					 Only when Pyongyang makes a dynamic advance as a model, is it possible to make the flames of the drive for building a highly civilized nation rage across the country.
					
					 It is necessary for all Pyongyangites to enshrine Kim Jong Il's patriotism and translate into reality the Party's plan for building a highly civilized nation with clean conscience and sincere efforts, whether they are known or appreciated or not.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Immortal Feats of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Immortal Feats of Kim Il Sung
						
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article says President Kim Il Sung will be alive in the hearts of the Korean people and the world revolutionary people as the eternal sun of Juche and the sun of mankind, no matter how much water may flow under the bridge and no matter how many generations may be replaced with new ones.
					 He is the peerlessly great man whom the Korean people acclaimed for the first time in the history spanning five thousands of years, the great leader, the father of the people and the most distinguished leader in the 20th century who performed the undying feats on behalf of the era and revolution, the country and its people, the article says, and goes on: 
					
					 In the whole period of his revolutionary leadership, he set forth independence as the lifeline and settled all issues in the revolution and construction in keeping with the requirement of the Korean revolution, interests of the Korean people and the specific condition of the country.
					
					 He put the trend of history in the 20th century when a fierce struggle between progressives and reactionaries and between socialism and imperialism was being waged onto an orbit of independence. This serves a miracle to be specially recorded in the history of modern politics.
					
					 Korean-style socialism, the greatest patriotic heritage bequeathed by him, is the eternal foundation to dynamically push forward the building of a thriving socialist nation in the new century and successfully accomplish the socialist cause of Juche.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will wage a more dynamic struggle to translate into a brilliant reality the dream and ideal of the people on this land under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, cherishing deep in mind the feats of Kim Il Sung who built the socialist state centered on the popular masses.
					
					 The history of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea is the glorious course shining with their idea, leadership and undying feats and this is the way of eternal victory and prosperity of the country to be followed by the DPRK for all ages.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Visits Sunchon Cement Complex
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Visits Sunchon Cement Complex
						
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the Sunchon Cement Complex. 
					 Going round different places of the complex, the premier encouraged workers there achieving successes in the drive for increased production. 
					
					 There took place a consultative meeting which stressed the need to ensure full-capacity operation of the equipment to send more cement to construction sites and the need for relevant units to provide necessary electricity and materials for cement production. 
					
					 The premier also went round the Munsu Water Park in Pyongyang. 
					
					 He learned about the management and operation of the park and service there and took necessary measures.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Russian Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Russian Regional Government
e042217 - Gift to Kim Jong Un from Russian Regional Government
					
					 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Sakhalin Regional Government of Russia.
					
					 The gift was handed over to an official concerned by head of the visiting delegation of the Sakhalin Regional Government Gakh Elena Nikolayevna, deputy minister of Economic Development, on Tuesday.

articles.title: Foreigners Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreigners Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Neil Forbes Davidson, senator from the British Labor Party, and his companion visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Tuesday.
					 They paid high tribute to the statues of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 At the halls where the Generalissimos lie in state, the guests made a bow to them.
					
					 The guests went round the halls where orders the Generalissimos received are on display and the halls which house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: National Festival of School Youth and Children Closes
articles.content:
National Festival of School Youth and Children Closes
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The 19th national festival of school youth and children closed with due ceremony at the Central Youth Hall Tuesday.
					 The festival was held, divided into political, economic, art and sports festivals. Pyongyang City took the first place in total points.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Ri Il Hwan, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, officials of the youth league and school youth and children.

articles.title: Credentials to Kim Yong Nam by Greek Ambassador
articles.content:
Credentials to Kim Yong Nam by Greek Ambassador
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received credentials from Greek Ambassador to the DPRK Dionisios Sourvanos at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
					 Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Reception Given by Iranian Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Reception Given by Iranian Ambassador to DPRK 
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Iranian Ambassador to the DPRK Mansour Chavoshi gave a reception at his embassy Tuesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Jong Yong Su, minister of Labor who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Iran Friendship Association, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Ri Kil Song, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Mansour Chavoshi said that April 15, the birthday of the President, is the day of the sun when the great changes were achieved and epochal phase opened in the history of the revolutionary struggle of the Korean people.
					
					 The foundation of the DPRK was more firmly cemented thanks to leader Kim Jong Il, the ambassador noted, adding that Iran always supports the Korean people in their struggle to defend the country's sovereignty and gains.
					
					 He expressed belief that the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is realizing the noble desire of the preceding leaders would bring about progress and prosperity of the DPRK.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop said that it is an expression of the boundless reverence for Kim Il Sung that the Iranian friends are significantly celebrating the Day of the Sun together with the Korean people every year.
					
					 He expressed the firm stand of the DPRK government to invariably strengthen the friendly and cooperative relations with Iran associated with the noble feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He said that the DPRK will extend firm support and solidarity to the Iranian government and people in their struggle to resolutely smash the sanctions of the hostile forces and their military threats.

articles.title: Reception Given by Palestinian Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Reception Given by Palestinian Ambassador to DPRK 
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan Tuesday gave a reception at his embassy on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there on invitation were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University and minister of Higher Education of the Education Commission, Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the C.C., the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Palestine Friendship Association, and officials concerned.
					
					 Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan said in his speech that the President set an example which would serve as guidelines in the struggle of the oppressed people to win freedom and independence.
					
					 The President forged intimacy with HE Yasser Arafat and set a good example of the revolutionary obligation in the struggle for national liberation, he said, adding:
					
					 The Palestinian people are always standing by the Korean people who are struggling to attain the aim for building a thriving socialist nation while overcoming all difficulties and hardships under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok said that it is an expression of the reverence for Kim Il Sung who made an immortal contribution to the human cause of independence that the Palestinian friends are celebrating the Day of the Sun together with the Korean people every year.
					
					 The President rendered sincere assistance to the people of various countries who are fighting for independence and sovereignty, justice and peace with the noble obligation of internationalism, thus making a great contribution to the cause of human liberation, he said, adding:
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to strengthen the militant friendship and unity between the peoples of the two countries associated with the noble intention and precious feats of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Railway Delegations Arrive
articles.content:
Railway Delegations Arrive 
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Committee of the Organization of Railways Cooperation led by Chairman Tadeusz Szozda arrived here on Tuesday to take part in the 29th meeting of the organization of general directors. 
					 Also arriving here was a Polish railway delegation.

articles.title: Delegation of Center for Energy and Security Studies of Russia Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Center for Energy and Security Studies of Russia Here
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Center for Energy and Security Studies of Russia headed by Director Anton Khlopkov arrived here on Tuesday by air.

articles.title: Delegation of Koreans in Japan Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Koreans in Japan Leaves
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The delegation of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) headed by Ri Ki Sok, advisor to the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, left here on Tuesday.

articles.title: Participants in Kimilsungia Festival Leave
articles.content:
Participants in Kimilsungia Festival Leave 
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Yang Hongzhun, general manager of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse in Hunchun, China, left here on Tuesday after participating in the 16th Kimilsungia Festival.
					 Also leaving here earlier were Liu Chensheng, board director of the Shenyang Korean Economic and Trade Investment Consultative Co. Ltd., of China, Wang Dongping, general manager of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse in Dandong, China, and Li Xiangjun, vice-president of the Azalea Branch of the China Flower Association, Choe Ryong Ho, vice-president of Yanbian University of Science and Technology of China, and their parties and Bayartogtokh Enkhbayar, representative of the Mongolian Kimjongilia Association.

articles.title: New Kinds of Sporting Apparatuses and Software Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Kinds of Sporting Apparatuses and Software Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- New kinds of sporting apparatuses and a software were recently developed in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Developed by Kim Il Sung University, they have been already applied to training in sports teams in Pyongyang City.
					
					 A wrestling training apparatus, applicable to basic training movements, helps correctly measure strength, endurance and speed of wrestlers.
					
					 A boxing training apparatus, installed with LED lamp and a measuring device, helps coaches to give scientific training guidance to boxers.
					
					 A software for vaulting training helps ensure correctness of movements. The software is also useful for other rotary sporting events.

articles.title: Kim Hong Do, Pioneer of Genre in Korea
articles.content:
Kim Hong Do, Pioneer of Genre in Korea
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Hong Do was a realistic Korean painter dating back to 18th to 19th century.
					 In his lifetime, he created a number of masterpieces, ranging from figure and landscape paintings to prints.
					
					 Characterized by diverse themes and skillful techniques, his genre paintings represented humble and sound mental world of popular masses, while ridiculing corrupt life of feudal bureaucrats.
					
					 Typical of his works are "Washing Site", "Wrestling", "Fishing", "Archery", "Well Site" and "Gambling of Aristocrats".
					
					 All of his paintings vividly reflected social standings, jobs, ages and characters of figures.
					
					 Among his landscape paintings were "Scenery of Mt. Kumgang", "Kuryong Falls", "Hongryu Valley" and "Ferryboat".
					
					 Many of Kim Hong Do's paintings were listed as national treasures in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

articles.title: Japan's Past Crimes and Moves for Revival of Militarism Denounced
articles.content:
Japan's Past Crimes and Moves for Revival of Militarism Denounced
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- A south Korean organization for movement for peace against war hosted a photo exhibition in Seoul on April 16, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Minbo. On display were photos disclosing Japan's past crimes and reinvasion moves.
					 Speeches were made before the exhibition.
					
					 Speakers denounced Japan for intensifying the militarist moves for veering to the Right as evidenced by the distortion of past history, the undisguised wild ambition for grabbing  other's territory, moves to exercise the "right to collective self-defense" and renouncement of the policy on arms embargo.
					
					 The distortion of history is aimed to cover up the past crimes, they charged.
					
					 They accused Japan of working hard to revive militarism, far from making an apology and reparation for the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past by inflicting the fate of colonial slave and all kinds of misfortune and sufferings on the Koreans.
					
					 They blasted the U.S. for instigating Japan, a war criminal state, to exercise the "right to collective self-defence", seeking a military alliance among the U.S., Japan and south Korea and ratcheting up military tensions in Northeast Asia.
					
					 They expressed hope that the photo exhibition would offer an occasion for warding off Japan's moves for the revival of militarism and positively contributing to peace on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 The organization said it would hold the next photo exhibition outside the U.S. embassy from April 21 to 25.

articles.title: Memorial Service Demands Park Geun Hye Regime Step down in S. Korea
articles.content:
Memorial Service Demands Park Geun Hye Regime Step down in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- South Korean progressive organizations comprising people of various social standings including the Society of April Revolution, the Solidarity for Progress and the Federation of Peasants Associations held a joint memorial service in Seoul on April 19 to mark the 54th anniversary of the April 19 popular uprising, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Thongil News.
					 Speakers said the April 19 uprising was a struggle for democracy as it signified a historic watershed that taught that independence, democracy and reunification were the only road for the nation to take.
					
					 It is deeply lamentable to see the "government" remaining incompetent to handle the issues related to the existence of the people though it promptly moves to ensure the security of its power, they added.
					
					 Democracy is being violated and suppressed by the "Saenuri Party", they said, stressing the need for the people from all walks of life to become a driving force and struggle for democracy and reunification.
					
					 Just as Syngman Rhee who was elected through the fraud-tainted March 15 election was ousted by the April 19 uprising, the Park Geun Hye regime which was installed through the fraud-marred election will be eliminated from the historic arena without fail, they stressed.

articles.title: Bulgarian Organization Supports DPRK's Rocket Launching
articles.content:
Bulgarian Organization Supports DPRK's Rocket Launching
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association released a commentary in its bulletin on April 10 in support of the independent right of the DPRK to launch rockets. 
					 The commentary said:
					
					 Now the U.S. is making much ado, terming the DPRK's rocket-launching drills for self-defence a "provocation" and "violation", but the Korean people regard it as pitiful cries and invectives of the weak. 
					
					 The U.S., styling itself the only superpower in the world, has stockpiled nuclear weapons more than any other country in the world and threatened many countries by launching missiles at any old time. 
					
					 Great irony is that the U.S. is noisily talking about "threats" from the DPRK's launching of several rockets.
					
					 In view of the fact that the U.S. is so afraid of the DPRK's regular rocket-launching drills, if the latter launches more powerful rockets, the former might lose its senses. 
					
					 If the U.S. does not want to make a fool of itself before the world, it should refrain from encroaching upon the self-defensive right of the DPRK.

articles.title: Seminars, Book Exhibitions Held in Different Countries
articles.content:
Seminars, Book Exhibitions Held in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Seminars and book exhibitions were held in Russia, Poland and Nepal on March 31 and April 5 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					  Displayed on the front walls of the venues of the events were portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also on display there were famous works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 The first secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and other speakers referred to the exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chief of the Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association and other speakers paid high tribute to Kim Il Sung who made great contributions to the cause of global independence.
					
					 The minister of Industry of the Nepalese government said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was the father of the people who advanced the line and policies for them and devoted his all to carrying out them, regarding it as maxim to believe in the people as in Heaven all his life. He was also a gifted strategist and symbol of the victory in the anti-imperialist struggle, who defeated two imperialisms in one generation.
					
					 He is deeply revered by the people for his great exploits.
					
					 The Korean people are making a leap forward in building an economic power under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to him were adopted at the seminars in Poland and Nepal.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Serbian Political Party on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Serbian Political Party on Its Website
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The full text of Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was posted by the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia on its website on April 14.
					 The work, made public on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the revolutionary exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed in their lifetimes. It indicates the tasks for firmly defending and eternally glorifying their ideas and exploits. 
					
					 Posted on the website was a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Bangladeshi Political Parties
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Bangladeshi Political Parties
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Bangladesh, Bangladesh Communist Party, Socialist Party of Bangladesh and Communist Party of Bangladesh (Marxist-Leninist) made public a joint statement on April 10 in support of the appeal adopted at the 18th seminar of world political parties on the building of a new society. 
					 The statement said the undying exploits Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed will be everlasting with the history of mankind. 
					
					 It expressed the will to hold memorial services with splendor and sincerity in reflection of the minds of the Bangladeshi people always remembering the Generalissimos on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of Kim Il Sung and the 3rd anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Empresa Pesquera 8 de Enero del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Empresa Pesquera 8 de Enero del EPC
 Pyongyang, 22 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito la Empresa Pesquera 8 de Enero del EPC en visperas de su inauguracion.
					 El Mariscal se entero en detalles del estado de construccion de la empresa y de preparacion de su inauguracion dando vueltas por varios lugares de ella.
					
					 Pasando por el rompeolas de cientos de metros erguido en medio del mar, dijo que parece una pista de aterrizaje.
					
					 Apunto que fueron construidas perfectamente las instalaciones necesarias para la refrigeracion y la saladura de los productos maritimos y dotados suficientemente de transportador de cintas de seleccion y lavadura de peces, el plano refrigerador maximo, coches frigorificos, cisternas, y montacargas, preparados por el partido.
					
					 Expreso gran satisfaccion de que el albergue y salas de descanso fueron acondicionados en maximo nivel como hogares de los pescadores.
					
					 Alabo que la zona de viviendas de varios pisos para los pescadores fue construida bien como la Avenida de los Cientificos Unha y la bautizo como la aldea Tanphung de pescadores.
					
					 Subio al barco de pesca construido nuevamente donde al enterarse de las propiedades tecnicas del objeto, califico que ahora estan en construccion gran numero de modernos barcos pesqueros de serie Tanphung conforme a la voluntad del partido y se mejora cada dia la capacidad de barcos.
					
					 Senalo que esta empresa es la obra maestra de la epoca del PTC y nuevo paisaje de la epoca del Songun aparecido en ensenada del Mar Este de Corea.
					
					 Cuando todos los barcos esten abarrotados de peces, este lugar se llamaria como 14o maravilla de la epoca del Songun, dijo con seguridad.
					
					 Durante 2 meses y pico despues de iniciada la construccion de esta empresa, la empresa cumplio con exito las tareas inmensas de la obra y esta en visperas de inauguracion, lo cual es un milagro asombroso y esto es la velocidad de Corea, destaco.
					
					 Gracias al espiritu indoblegable de lucha de los constructores militares que se movilizaron como un solo hombre en pleno acato a la orden del Partido, nuestro Partido llego a cumplir el compromiso hecho con el pueblo, apunto el y volvio a elogiar las proezas de ellos.
					
					 El partido hizo construir la Empresa Pesquera 8 de Enero del EPC como modelo de todo el pais, por eso, el ejercito y la sociedad deben tomar por estandar esta empresa cuando construyan o reconstruyan las bases pesqueras, indico.
					
					 Hay que llenarse en todo el pais del perfume del mar socialista, lo cual es la firme decision del Partido, asevero y subrayo que los funcionarios y pescadores de la empresa deben responder a la esperanza del Partido con alta produccion, concluyo.
					
					 Le acompanaron en la ocasion Jang Jong Nam, So Hong Chan, Han Kwang Sang, Hwang Pyong So, Ri Jae Il, Kim Pyong Ho y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de vuelo de la unidad 188
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de vuelo de la unidad 188
 Pyongyang, 22 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio el dia 21 el entrenamiento de vuelo de la Unidad 188 de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC, galardonada con el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup.
					 El Comandante Supremo dio la orden de inicio de la maniobra.
					
					 Despego primero el avion de Kil Hun, hijo del piloto heroe Kil Yong Jo.
					
					 Mirando sonriente la navegacion de Kil Hun, el Mariscal se puso muy satisfecho diciendo que el es el hijo del heroe Kil Yong Jo y esta siguiendo la linea aerea de su padre defendiendo la patria de generacion en generacion.
					
					 Kil Hun llego al punto donde le esperaba el Mariscal manejando con destreza su avion y le dio el parte de cumplimiento de la orden de entrenamiento.
					
					 El Comandante Supremo abrazo a el y apreto su mano durante un rato diciendole "bravo".
					
					 Recordo que escucho atentamente la intervencion de Kil Hun en la Primera Conferencia de Pilotos del EPC y continuo que el cumplio hoy con acciones el juramento tomado aquel dia.
					
					 Pregunto cuantos anos tenia cuando fallecio su padre y si recordaba el rostro de su padre.
					
					 Continuo que Kil Hun perdio a su padre cuando tenia 3 anos y a la edad de 25 anos y se hizo jefe de la compania de aviacion al igual que su padre, y apunto que asi continua el linaje de la revolucion coreana.
					
					 El heroe Kil Yong Jo fue piloto verdadero quien manifesto con accion el espiritu de defensa a ultranza al lider, recalco.
					
					 Encomendando a Kil Hun que se pusiera al frente de la unidad en el vuelo de defensa de la patria como lo hizo su padre, tomo una foto de recuerdo con el abrazandolo.
					
					 Luego, otros aviones de la unidad se inyectaron en el cielo en formacion de gemelos.
					
					 Cumpliendo dificiles misiones como dar giros en la altitud muy baja, las escuadrillas demostraron el impetu combativo de destruir el baluarte de los enemigos, por el estilo de ataque del monte Paektu, en cualquier momento cuando se de la orden de despegue.
					
					 El Comandante Supremo estimulo a los pilotos que terminaron los ejercicios y se fotografio con ellos.
					
					 Informado de que regresaron ayer los pilotos participantes en la Conferencia mencionada, organice de repente este entrenamiento, pero ellos lo hicieron muy bien, dijo.
					
					 Este hecho comprueba que la unidad se mantiene siempre en la perfecta disposicion de combate bajo la consigna "!Esperamos la orden de despegue del partido!", apunto.
					
					 Senalando que cada minuto y segundo decide el resultado de combate aereo, dio la indicacion de intensificar en la unidad los ejercicios de vuelo para preparar a los aviadores como competentes guardias del cielo.
					
					 Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Jang Jong Nam, So Hong Chan, Han Gwang Sang, Hwang Pyong So, Ri Jae Il, Kim Pyong Ho y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: ACNC comenta demagogia anti-RPDC de estafadores politicos
articles.content:
ACNC comenta demagogia anti-RPDC de estafadores politicos
 Pyongyang, 22 de abril (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 17, el presidente del "comite de investigacion" de la situacion de derechos humanos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Michael Kirby, concedio una conferencia de prensa en la sede de la ONU.
					 Cuando los corresponsales de varios paises sospechaban la autenticidad del "informe sobre DDHH" presentado por el comite, el les respondio que eso se basa en los "testimonios de los fugitivos norcoreanos".
					
					 Prosiguio que ahora es el tiempo de convocar la reunion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU para tratar el "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC y discutir el tema de remitirlo a la Corte Penal Internacional.
					
					 El acto verbal de Kirby tiene la meta de atribuir autenticidad a su invento y crear el ambiente de presion internacional sobre el "problema" de la RPDC.
					
					 Detras de ello, esta el peligroso proposito politico de EE.UU. y de sus seguidores de suprimir la idea y regimen de la RPDC.
					
					 Fracasadas en su intento de doblegar a la RPDC con el "problema nuclear", las fuerzas hostiles cuestionan tanto el "problema de DDHH" considerandolo como medio principal para atropellar a la RPDC.
					
					 En esa sucia campana estan movilizados los estafadores politicos como Michael Kirby.
					
					 Kirby, inventor principal del susodicho "informe", es un viejo lujurioso que dejo sonados casos de homosexualidad durante mas de 40 anos pasados y ahora, aunque tiene mas de 70 anos de edad, esta impaciente por casarse con otro maricon.
					
					 El que se atreve a atender el problema de DDHH de un pais es ese "pajaro" que no puede existir en la RPDC, donde reinan la idea sana y la etica noble, y causa escandalo social hasta en los paises occidentales.
					
					 Como ya conocido, la fuente de datos presentados por la banda de Kirby es la chismografia de los "fugitivos norcoreanos" que huyeron al Sur de Corea tras cometer imperdonables crimenes ante el pais y el pueblo o actos terroristas.
					
					 Sin embargo, los compinches de Kirby, que se creen jurisperitos, inventaron el informe con esos datos sin confirmar su veracidad, lo cual pone en entredicho sus conocimientos del derecho.
					
					 Parece que ellos cambiaron su magistrado con el dinero ofrecido por EE.UU. y sus satelites.
					
					 Ahora muchos paises y hasta algunos medios de prensa occidentales critican el "informe" como una copia de la insistencia al estilo nazista mostrandose consternados por la circulacion del mismo documento en la organizacion de la ONU.
					
					 El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC condenan ese informe intrigante estigmatizandolo como caso repugnante nunca visto antes en la historia mundial de DDHH.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente argelino
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente argelino
 Pyongyang, 22 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 21 un mensaje de felicitacion a Abdelaziz Bouteflika con motivo de su reeleccion como presidente de la Republica Argelina Democratica y Popular.
					 En su misiva, el remitente desea al destinatario y a su pueblo nuevos y mayores exitos en sus trabajos para consolidar la unidad nacional y lograr la prosperidad economica.
					
					 Manifiesta la conviccion de que seguiran fortaleciendose y desarrollandose tambien en el futuro las historicas relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre ambos paises.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre Complejo de Cemento de Sunchon
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre Complejo de Cemento de Sunchon
 Pyongyang, 22 de abril (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju averiguo en el terreno las gestiones del Complejo de Cemento de Sunchon.
					 Recorriendo varios puntos, Pak estimulo los exitos logrados por la clase obrera que se esfuerza por incrementar la produccion.
					
					 En la reunion consultiva, destaco la necesidad de garantizar el pleno funcionamiento de los equipos para suministrar mucha cantidad de cemento a los campos de construccion de todo el pais y asegurar con suficiencia en las unidades correspondientes la electricidad y las materias primas necesarias a la produccion.
					
					 Por otra parte, el premier estuvo en el capitalino Complejo de Piscinas de Recreacion de Munsu.
					
					 Averiguo el estado de administracion y uso del complejo y asigno las tareas necesarias a las unidades correspondientes.
